TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task SetAttributesCallbackAsync(object source, object destination);
.class public auto ansi sealed SetAttributesCallbackAsync extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function SetAttributesCallbackAsync(source As Object, destination As Object) As Task
type SetAttributesCallbackAsync = delegate of obj * obj -> Task

Docs.param: Instance of destination to be overwritten.
Docs.summary: Callback invoked to set destination's attributes in memory. The attributes set in this callback will be sent to azure storage service.
